name: First Person Slapper :)
description:
First Person Slapper A game where you slap balls together :)

A short puzzle game me and a friend made in Godot for a little game jam organized by one of our teachers.

It's the first game we ever made and most of the assets were created by us during the two day jam.

It's really rough around the edges but we are happy we could actually finish somethings that could loosely be called a game.

We hope you enjoy! :)

Music, sound design, programming and level design:
Marc-Éric Martel

Texturing, programming, level decoration and a little bit of level design
Victor Turgeon (Moi)
